summary:
-=FIRST MOD SO PLS GO EASY=-

This was my old save character, the save corrupted and isn't fixable D: so now he's just a good follower mod

-=VOICE ACTING COMING SOON=-
descriptionHtml:
-=VOICE ACTING COMING SOON=-  

[PROFILE] 
Black Eyes is a nordic ranger from whiterun, he enjoys slaying giants, drinking ale and long walks on the beach 
This is just a follower version of my in game character at this point in time, he carries Elven armor, an elven bow, a skyforge steel sword, and the mask of the dragon priest Krosis 
He is an experienced Archer and a loyal companion 

[LOCATION] 
Black Eyes is located in the Drunken Huntsman Inn, in Whiterun he will follow you without hesitation and will act like you're old friends
author: BunniWabbit
